attributes.action: To accept EU proposal for citizenship after UK leaves the EU.
attributes.additional_details: contravene the human rights act in denying it. We therefore hereby call upon the government Theresa May David Davies and the House of Parliament to accept this.
attributes.background: We the citizens of United Kingdom have been given the understanding that Mr Verhofstadt, Has said that on exiting the EU British people will be given the chance of dual citizenship by granting them EU citizenship. As a country that already recognizes dual citizenship status this would
